com.soa.message

Class SimpleTransaction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.soa.message.SimpleTransaction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageTransaction

    public class SimpleTransaction
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageTransaction
    Abstract implementation of the MessageTransaction interface that provides basic data member access.

      • getPropertyNames

        public java.util.Set getPropertyNames()
        Description copied from interface: MessageTransaction
        Returns the names of the properties associated with the context. Changes made to the Set are reflected in the context, so if a name is removed from the Set, the property is removed from the context. Names cannot be added however.
        Specified by:
        getPropertyNames in interface MessageTransaction
        Returns:
        Set of String property names.

        Returns:
